alert.note: Alert for Telfair (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 11:01AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Telfair County through 1130 AM EDT... At 1100 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near China Hill, or 15 miles northeast of Fitzgerald, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, China Hill, Horse Creek Wma and Workmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
